title: Document repo-scoped Beads + PR workflow in OpenClaw Studio CONTRIBUTING
description:
Goal: Ensure contributors understand that tasks are tracked with repo-scoped Beads and changes flow via PRs.

Context: We are adopting a multi-agent operating model; Beads live in the repo (.beads/) and are exported to .beads/issues.jsonl before commits.

Approach: Update CONTRIBUTING.md (or README.md if more appropriate) with a short section describing: br init, br create, br sync --flush-only, one-bead-one-PR.

Acceptance:
- Docs mention where Beads live (.beads/ in repo)
- Docs mention exporting issues.jsonl before committing
- Docs mention one bead -> one PR

Verify:
- N/A (docs change)
close_reason: Done (docs updated; verify by reading CONTRIBUTING.md Task tracking (Beads) section)
